conversation.name: Alice
conversation.message: Hi, I have logged 10 miles today.

conversation.name: Mr. Smith
conversation.message: Great job, Alice! I'll review your log.

conversation.name: Mr. Smith
conversation.message: Your 10 miles have been approved.

conversation.name: Alice
conversation.message: Thank you, Mr. Smith!

conversation.message: Your 15 miles are now approved.

conversation.name: Bob
conversation.message: Thanks a lot, Ms. Johnson!
